about: We are a creative technical agency who build all manor of lovely digital things.
description:
Made is a creatively focused web development agency based in London. We produce award winning work for a variety of platforms, including web, mobile and in-store, using cutting-edge technology and best practice techniques. Our comprehensive range of services enable us to deliver projects of all shapes and sizes, from small interactive experiences to global multi-platform e-commerce solutions.

At Made we like to think that that we’re a bit different to traditional development agencies. We value design and interaction, and believe both are critical to a project’s success. We don’t talk jargon and we have a flexible process in place because every project is different and sometimes requirements do change. Our agnostic approach to technology means that we will only choose and suggest technologies that are right for the job.

Some of our recent projects include:

http://www.dalziel-pow.com
http://www.byronhamburgers.com
http://www.lacostechampionship.com
http://www.speirsandmajor.com
http://www.xfactorkaraoke.com
http://www.bibliothequedesign.com
http://www.pickmix.co.uk
http://home.luckyvoice.com
name: Made, Creative Development
